m_szDocTitle: Hydrogen-powered fleets could help tackle high urban pollution levels | Guardian Sustainable Business | The Guardian
m_szDocSumamry: Hydrogen-powered fleets could help tackle high urban pollution levels Paid for by Anglo American From city buses to delivery trucks, back-to-base vehicles in urban areas could help drive a hydrogen transport revolution and quell smog levels The sun rises above the financial district in London. There are zero harmful tailpipe emissions from hydrogen-powered vehicles, so adoption could help reduce smog levels. Photograph: Kieran Doherty/REUTERS Lucy Purdy Friday 11 March 2016 09.53 EST Last modified on Friday 11 March 2016 09.56 EST Share on WhatsApp Billed as the next generation of green cars,
